mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_name, d.emp_dept_name AS 'dept_name', cc_grade.common_code_name AS 'grade_name', cc_position.common_code_name AS 'position_name', NOW() AS 'apv_date' FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx JOIN commons_code cc_position ON cc_position.common_code_idx = e.emp_position_idx JOIN commons_code cc_grade ON cc_grade.common_code_idx = e.emp_grade_idx WHERE e.emp_id = #{emp_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE apv SET apv_approver = #{apv_approver} WHERE apv_idx = #{apv_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT emp_id FROM apv_line WHERE apv_line = (SELECT apv_line + 1 FROM apv_line WHERE apv_idx = #{apv_idx} AND emp_id = #{apv_approver}) AND apv_idx = #{apv_idx}
SELECT apv_history_date FROM apv_history WHERE apv_idx = #{apv_idx} ORDER BY apv_history_date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE apv SET apv_stmt = #{apv_stmt} WHERE apv_idx = #{apv_idx}
UPDATE apv SET apv_num = #{apv_num} WHERE apv_idx = #{apv_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT a.apv_idx,a.apv_code, a.apv_subject, a.apv_date, e.emp_name, d.emp_dept_name AS 'dept_name' , a.apv_stmt FROM apv a JOIN employee e ON e.emp_id = a.emp_id JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx WHERE apv_approver = #{emp_id} AND a.apv_stmt = '진행중'
SELECT * FROM apv a WHERE a.apv_idx = #{apv_idx}
SELECT * FROM apv_history WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id} AND apv_idx = #{apv_idx}
SELECT apv_history_stmt, apv_history_reason FROM apv_history WHERE apv_idx = #{apv_idx} ORDER BY apv_history_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT emp_id,apv_line FROM apv_line WHERE apv_idx = #{apv_idx}

SELECT a.apv_idx, a.apv_code, a.apv_subject, a.apv_stmt, (SELECT e.emp_name FROM apv_line al JOIN employee e ON e.emp_id = al.emp_id WHERE al.apv_idx = a.apv_idx ORDER BY al.apv_line DESC LIMIT 1) as emp_name, ah.apv_history_date FROM apv_history ah JOIN apv a ON ah.apv_idx = a.apv_idx WHERE ah.emp_id = #{emp_id}
